markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wand of Contagious Frailty](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2275)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 139 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 160 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Cracks and healed fractures spiderweb the shaft of this bone wand, worsening each time the wand is used. The bone's worn epiphysis forms the wand's pommel, and black leather wraps around the handle.

<document level="2" id="action-1822" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _ray of enfeeblement_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Wand of Contagious Frailty
